fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fractures with minimal trauma, back pain, loss of height over time.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Family history of osteoporosis, sedentary lifestyle, inadequate calcium and vitamin D intake.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease characterised by weakened bones that are more prone to fracture.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Decreased bone density on physical exam; may have kyphosis.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Osteomalacia, secondary causes of bone loss
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Calcium and vitamin D supplementation, weight-bearing exercise
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular bone density monitoring, fall prevention strategies
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe joint pain, redness, and swelling, often affecting the big toe.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: High purine diet, alcohol consumption, family history of gout.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A form of inflammatory arthritis characterised by elevated levels of uric acid in the blood.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen, tender, red joint; tophus formation in chronic cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Diet modification, avoid triggers like red meat and alcohol
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, colchicine, allopurinol for urate lowering
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle changes, monitoring of uric acid levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Joint pain and stiffness that worsen with activity, limited range of motion.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Degenerative joint disease leading to cartilage breakdown.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy, assistive devices for mobility
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain and tenderness near a joint, worsened by movement.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Repetitive motion, injury, age-related wear and tear.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation or irritation of a tendon.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness on palpation near the affected tendon.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Numbness, tingling, weakness, and pain in the hand and fingers.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Repetitive hand use, wrist anatomy, health disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease caused by pressure on the median nerve in the carpal tunnel.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, corticosteroid injections, surgery if severe
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Wrist splinting at night, ergonomic assessment
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Joint pain and swelling, tenderness, and warmth over the affected area.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Repetitive motion or pressure, trauma, rheumatoid arthritis.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the bursa, a small fluid-filled sac that cushions the bones, tendons, and muscles near joints.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swelling, warmth, and redness over the joint.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Avoid activities that aggravate the disease
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sharp heel pain, particularly with the first steps in the morning.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the plantar fascia on the bottom of the foot.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness on the bottom of the foot near the heel.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Stretching exercises, orthotic devices, physical therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Weight loss if overweight, supportive shoes
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Visible curvature of the spine, uneven shoulders or waist, one hip higher than the other.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic predisposition, idiopathic in most cases.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A lateral curvature of the spine.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Asymmetry in trunk and shoulders on examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Bracing in adolescents, surgery for severe curves
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Lower back pain radiating to the leg, numbness or weakness in leg or foot.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Heavy lifting, sudden movement, or aging.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Displacement of disc material beyond the intervertebral disc space.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Positive straight leg raise test, decreased reflexes.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, physical therapy, epidural steroid injections, surgery if necessary
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bone pain, joint pain and stiffness, enlarged or misshapen bones.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disorder of bone remodelling that leads to enlarged and weakened bones.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged skull, bowed limbs, or warm skin over affected bones.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, bisphosphonates
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of bone density and serum alkaline phosphatase levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Shoulder pain, especially with overhead activities, weakness in the shoulder.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the rotator cuff tendons in the shoulder.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain on shoulder abduction, positive impingement signs.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Progressive shoulder stiffness and pain, limited range of motion.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Often follows an injury or period of immobilisation.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Characterised by thickening and tightening of the shoulder capsule.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Limited shoulder movements in all directions.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Corticosteroid injections, shoulder distension, manipulation under anaesthesia
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy focused on stretching, gradual mobilisation exercises
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain and stiffness along the Achilles tendon, particularly in the morning.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Running and other forms of exercise, tight calf muscles.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness and swelling near the heel.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Bone pain, fever, swelling, redness over the affected area.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Bacterial infection, often following surgery or injury.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Localised tenderness and warmth over the involved bone.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: IV antibiotics, surgical debridement if necessary
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for signs of chronic infection, manage pain
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Knee pain, swelling, locking sensation in the knee, difficulty bending and straightening the leg.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Common in athletes and individuals engaging in physical activities; can also occur from aging.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A tear in one of the knees menisci, the cartilage that stabilises and cushions the knee joint.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Joint line tenderness, McMurray test positive.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy, surgical repair or meniscectomy if necessary
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain at the front of the knee, exacerbated by jumping, running, or walking up stairs.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Often seen in athletes involved in sports requiring frequent jumping.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the patellar tendon, connecting the kneecap to the shinbone.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness at the lower part of the kneecap, pain with knee extension.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy, eccentric exercises, corticosteroid injections
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Strengthening and flexibility exercises, gradual return to activity
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Back pain, leg pain while walking or standing, relief with sitting; numbness, weakness, or tingling in the legs.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Aging, degenerative changes; may be congenital.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Narrowing of the spinal canal, compressing the spinal cord and nerves.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Decreased lumbar range of motion, neurogenic claudication.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Peripheral artery disease, lumbar disc herniation
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, epidural steroid injections, surgical decompression
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Progressive thickening and tightening of the palmar fascia, leading to finger flexion contractures.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Most common in males over 50 and those of Northern European descent.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A connective tissue disorder affecting the hand.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Palpable nodules in the palm, flexed fingers that cannot be fully extended.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy post-intervention, use of night splints
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Lower back pain radiating down the leg, numbness, tingling, or weakness in the affected leg.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Herniated disk, bone spur on the spine, or narrowing of the spine (spinal stenosis) compressing part of the sciatic nerve.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Irritation or inflammation of the sciatic nerve.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain that worsens with movement; loss of reflexes or muscle strength may be present.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, physical therapy, epidural steroid injections
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Exercise, proper posture, ergonomic adjustments at work
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Muscle weakness, bone pain, difficulty walking.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Vitamin D deficiency, certain medical disease affecting vitamin D metabolism.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Softening of the bones due to impaired bone mineralization.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Bone tenderness, difficulty in rising from a squatting position.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Correct underlying cause, supplementation with vitamin D and calcium
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular follow-up for monitoring vitamin D levels, dietary advice
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Muscle pain and stiffness, particularly in the shoulders and hips, fever, malaise.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown; may be related to immune system issues and genetic factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: An inflammatory disorder causing muscle pain and stiffness.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain and stiffness in the shoulders and pelvis, limited range of motion.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Corticosteroids, regular monitoring for side effects
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy, gradual increase in activity
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Lower back pain, leg pain, numbness or weakness in the legs, difficulty walking.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from congenital structural issues, degenerative changes, or trauma.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Slippage of one vertebral body over another, often leading to spinal nerve compression.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Lower lumbar tenderness, decreased range of motion, neurological deficits in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, physical therapy, surgery in severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sharp, burning pain in the ball of the foot. Tingling or numbness in the toes.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Thickening of the tissue around one of the nerves leading to the toes.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness on palpation between the toes, positive Mulders sign.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Changing footwear, reducing activities that put pressure on the feet
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Steroid injections, orthotic devices, surgery in severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Forward rounding of the back, back pain, stiffness, and in severe cases, breathing difficulties.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Poor posture, spinal osteoporosis, congenital disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A spinal curvature that causes a hunched or rounded back.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Visible curvature of the upper back, tight hamstrings.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy to improve posture and strengthen muscles
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Bracing in adolescents, surgery for severe curvature
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Posture education, regular exercise to strengthen back muscles
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain on the outside (lateral) or inside (medial) of the elbow, worsened with gripping or lifting.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Overuse from repetitive arm, wrist, or hand movements.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the tendons that attach to the elbows epicondyles.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness over the lateral or medial epicondyle, pain with wrist movements.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Strengthening and stretching exercises, ergonomic adjustments
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain at the base of the thumb, extending into the thumb and wrist when moving it.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Repetitive thumb movements, pregnancy, rheumatologic disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the sheaths of the thumb tendons.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain and swelling over the radial side of the wrist, positive Finkelsteins test.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, corticosteroid injections, surgery in refractory cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pain and prominence at the base of the big toe, difficulty with footwear.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Genetic predisposition, tight or poorly fitting shoes.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A lateral deviation of the big toe, leading to bunion formation.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Visible bony prominence, redness, and swelling at the first metatarsophalangeal joint.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Arthritis of the big toe, gout
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Conservative measures, surgical correction for severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Footwear modification, physiotherapy for toe mobility
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Visible lump on the wrist or hand, which may or may not be painful.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Aetiology is unknown; associated with joint or tendon irritation.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A fluid-filled cyst that develops near joints or tendons.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Round, smooth, firm lump, transillumination positive.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Aspiration, surgical removal for persistent or symptomatic cysts
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Wrist rest, avoidance of repetitive joint use
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Finger stiffness, clicking, or locking when bent and straightened.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Repeated use or gripping activities, more common in women and in patients with diabetes.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease in which a finger gets stuck in a bent position.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness at the base of the finger, noticeable click or lock.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Steroid injections, surgery to release the tendon
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Hand exercises, minimise repetitive gripping activities
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sharp pain radiating from the lower back down to the leg, numbness or weakness along the nerve pathway.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Herniated disc, bone spurs, spinal stenosis causing nerve root compression.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Nerve irritation or compression in the lumbar spine.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain on straight leg raise test, decreased reflexes and muscle strength in affected leg.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: NSAIDs, physical therapy, epidural steroid injections
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Maintain proper posture, ergonomic workplace adjustments
fields.label: Care Plan
